title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.5 - Patients deemed not dangerous
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.5 - Patients deemed not dangerous

State Regulations

If the patient is deemed not to be dangerous, he shall be
sought by the staff using methods appropriate to the patient's
condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
37.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
